topic: Generating a view file from camera calibration
body:
Hi there


Just want to say thanks for all the help given with my question about  
generating a view file from camera calibration. Claus thanks for your  
very helpful email and that script code, I now understand the whole  
process more clearly and it works a treat so please ignore that email  
I sent you!


Once again, your help is much appreciated


Tarik
